version_description: Hurry up to download our updated version. Some bugs are fixed up and new features are integrated to make our app more user-friendly and stable.

Downloading the new version of the Quppy Wallet application you will find a language support update as far as the integration of cryptoloans option powered by Nexo.

The new Quppy Wallet app version now supports the deposit and withdrawal of fiat currencies (euros) as well as the exchange between crypto and fiat currencies.

The new version of Quppy Wallet enables free fiat transfers between the users. We have also updated language support, keyboards and integrated the automatic update of the user verification status.
The new version of Quppy Wallet enables free fiat transfers between the users. We have also updated language support, keyboards and integrated the automatic update of the user verification status.
The new version of Quppy Wallet enables free fiat transfers between the users. We have also updated language support, keyboards and integrated the automatic update of the user verification status.

Downloading the new Quppy Wallet version, you will get the following services added and upgraded:
- send fiat to your own wallets;
- send fiat to other Quppy users without any fees;
- send fiat to legal entities;
- get lower exchange commissions;
- get a better fiat transaction processing;
- be easier verified;
- find the Quppy Wallet supporting Korean and Chinese;
- get all services faster.
We have already fixed the performance bags for some types of devices and elaborated different language versions.

The new version of the Quppy Wallet app marks the integration of British pounds. Now our users can open multicurrency accounts in EUR and GBP, accept and send payments and transfers in GBP using the Faster Payments and CHAPS instant transfer systems as well as send payments and transfers in EUR through the SEPA transfer system.
